e
of these minority groups. Moreover, unlike Justice Powell’s example, where the
race of a “particular black applicant” could be considered without being deci-
sive, the LSA’s automatic distribution of 20 points has the effect of making “the
factor of race . . . decisive” for virtually every minimally qualified underrepre-
sented minority applicant.
Also instructive in our consideration of the LSA’s system is the example
provided in the description of the Harvard College Admissions Program,
